scripts.build:lib: npm run build:lib:common && npm run build:lib:core && npm run build:lib:grpc-web-client && npm run build:lib:worker && npm run build:lib:worker-client
scripts.build:lib:core: ng build core --prod && cpy LICENSE.md dist/core/
scripts.build:lib:common: ng build common --prod && cpy LICENSE.md dist/common/
scripts.build:lib:grpc-web-client: ng build grpc-web-client --prod && cpy LICENSE.md dist/grpc-web-client/
scripts.build:lib:worker: ng build worker --prod && cpy LICENSE.md dist/worker/
scripts.build:lib:worker-client: ng build worker-client --prod && cpy LICENSE.md dist/worker-client/
scripts.test: npm run test:common && npm run test:core && npm run test:worker && npm run test:worker-client
scripts.examples:backend: docker-compose -f examples/backend/docker-compose.yaml down && docker-compose -f examples/backend/docker-compose.yaml up --remove-orphans --build
scripts.examples:proto:generate: npm run examples:proto:generate-backend && npm run examples:proto:generate-basic && npm run examples:proto:generate-worker
scripts.examples:proto:generate-basic: mkdir -p examples/basic-example/src/proto && rm -rf examples/basic-example/src/proto/* && protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ng=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ng --ng_out=examples/basic-example/src/proto -I examples/proto $(find examples/proto -iname "*.proto")
scripts.examples:proto:generate-worker: mkdir -p examples/worker-example/src/proto && rm -rf examples/worker-example/src/proto/* && protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ng=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ng --ng_out=worker=true:examples/worker-example/src/proto -I examples/proto $(find examples/proto -iname "*.proto")
